scripts.prepublish: pnpm clean && pnpm i && pnpm typecheck && pnpm test && pnpm build
scripts.publish:canary: pnpm clean && pnpm i && pnpm build --filter=outstatic && pnpm test --filter=outstatic && pnpm publish --filter=outstatic --tag canary
scripts.publish:latest: pnpm clean && pnpm i && pnpm build --filter=outstatic && pnpm test --filter=outstatic && pnpm publish --filter=outstatic --tag latest
scripts.publish:canary:dry: pnpm clean && pnpm i && pnpm build --filter=outstatic && pnpm test --filter=outstatic &&  pnpm publish --filter=outstatic --tag canary --dry-run
scripts.publish:latest:dry: pnpm clean && pnpm i && pnpm build --filter=outstatic && pnpm test --filter=outstatic && pnpm publish --filter=outstatic --tag latest --dry-run
scripts.pack:outstatic: pnpm clean && pnpm i && pnpm build --filter=outstatic && pnpm test --filter=outstatic && cd packages/outstatic && pnpm pack
